body: Why did Honoka suddenly change tone between the previous series and this one? She seemed perfectly content with their relationship before, but now she seems disgusted by him again?

Unless it's setting us for a plot twist I think the Otaku gonna choose Honoka as his wife, now I wonder if he plans an actual wedding it gonna be sick lol, sucks the author started doing other series when this was in the last arc.
i hope i can see another part
I really hate the male otaku here. If this was the author's intention, then I must say that he did a really good job on making such a repulsive character.
why it haven't had the 2nd part yet?
